extendedInfo.description: Available at $0.99 for a limited time only! "Emilly In Darkness" is an old school action-adventure game in which on one hand the character shoots, sets traps and learns new skills, but on the other hand the character must navigate a gloomy, complex world with a twisted and unpredictable plot, highlighted by cut-in animations and conversations with NPC's. "Emilly in Darkness" tells the story of Emilly who, for reasons unknown, wakes up alone in a dark forest, and after a few moments is fatally gunned down by an unseen assassin. However, she does not die, at least not in the traditional sense of death. Instead, Emilly finds herself suspended in a grim and odd place, not so different from hell. She is lost, alone, surrounded by demons, and oddly enough, other forlorn people, people whose intentions are not always clear. This is just the beginning... *IMPORTANT* Emilly In Darkness requires devices with minimum 512 MB RAM to run properly.Main features: â¢ Great story â¢ Dark atmospheric world â¢ Challenging gameplay â¢ Unique hand-drawn artwork â¢ Simple rpg elements (NPCs, skills development)zelda like gameplay, horror theme...

reviews.title: Great survival horror
reviews.comment: Great atmosphere and intriguing story. Game mechanics are pretty solid. The only bad thing is that sometimes (after death) the move stick control gets stuck. Also the shooting could use a dual stick for aiming.
reviews.author: Rodolfo Vindas

reviews.title: I love this game!
reviews.comment: Neat creepy atmosphere, pretty fun overall and a good story but movement / aim control does sometimes get stuck.  Pausing can often fixe it but not always (going to main menu always fixes it but you got to redo a bit of some levels).  Still it saves lots and really the sticking didn\'t affect my overall experience much.  It happens on this tablet but it doesn\'t happen on my phone tho so you may be fine on your device.  Update - The game is a bit short and has a couple of bugs, and I\'m not a person that gives out 5 Stars much, but this game was such a great experience.  It\'s not too long but it doesn\'t cost much either and is a full game with no IAP tricks so the entertainment value for the money makes it so worth it.  It\'s hard for me to explain just how much I enjoyed it in this short space but I\'m so very happy I got to play through this and can\'t wait to see what these guys do next!
reviews.author: Summer LaRose

reviews.title: Creepy
reviews.comment: Eerie, dark and cool fun is what the game is. Interesting storyline that is engaging and wants you to keep playing.
reviews.author: D Nguyen

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good game my only gripe is the joystick keeps sticking which is really annoying, will amend rating when n if it\'s sorted?
reviews.author: Keith Fitzroy

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: Emily walks too slow around the world. She kept getting stuck trying to walk left.  I did not think it was creepy or scary.. waste of $$..
reviews.author: Ki Anu

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Game won\'t advance past movie intro...tried skipping but always forces closed. Tried reinstalling but still nothing. Was looking forward to playing but it doesn\'t work. Will need refund.
reviews.author: Michael Salvati

reviews.comment: Pretty good if I could see where I\'m going. The game is way too dark half the time to even see the walls
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game dont work on my experia play
reviews.comment: When I open the game, a round figure appears and then returns to my home screen. Any ideas?!

reviews.title: Problemas
reviews.comment: N\303\243o funcionou corretamente no meu Galaxy Ace Duos
reviews.author: Rodrigo Ribeiro

reviews.title: Interesting and eerie
reviews.comment: I thought this game looked a lil spooky and iv been looking for a scary or strange game to play.  I liked the mysterious characters and story but the game itself is kinda short.  And I could have used a Lil more time to read the captions of dialogue.  I love the creepy atmospheres and style in this game but the load times could be shorter.
reviews.author: Wes M

reviews.title: G ace
reviews.comment: Wont download keeps saying error finaly downloaded after 2days trying but starts then goes blank for ages pls fix
reviews.author: Michelle Owen

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.comment: I\'ve only played to the 3rd gate but I must say I like this.  The pic of the girl had me intrigued and looking through the reviews I thought why not.  Glad I did.
reviews.author: Brandy Miller

reviews.title: Won\'t open
reviews.comment: Phone turns off each time game is launched. Please fix. HTC Desire C.

reviews.comment: emily in darkness great game really enjoyed it thanks$$$
